vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.32.41;
son of: Segub (H7687H)
Also named: ya.i.ri (יָאִרִי "Jairite" H2972)
§ Jair = "he enlightens"
1) a descendant of Manasseh who conquered many towns during the time of the conquest
2) the Gileadite, a judge of Israel for 22 years during the time of the judges; father of 30 sons
3) a Benjamite, son of Kish, and father of Mordecai
4) father of Elhanan, one of David's mighty warriors
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   descendiente de Manasés; (b)   juez de Israel ; (c)   padre de Mardoqueo; tribu de Benjamín
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
睚珥 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "他啟迪"
1) 瑪拿西的一個後裔, 他在征服時期攻克很多市鎮
2) 基列人, 在士師時代當以色列士師 22 年; 30 個兒子的父親
3) 便雅憫人, 基士之子, 末底改之父
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
睚珥 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "他启迪"
1) 玛拿西的一个后裔, 他在征服时期攻克很多市镇
2) 基列人, 在士师时代当以色列士师 22 年; 30 个儿子的父亲
3) 便雅悯人, 基士之子, 末底改之父

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Jair = "he enlightens"
This name is used for:
1) a descendant of Manasseh who conquered many towns during the time of the conquest
2) the Gileadite, a judge of Israel for 22 years during the time of the judges; father of 30 sons
3) a Benjamite, son of Kish, and father of Mordecai
4) father of Elhanan, one of David's mighty warriors

A man living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Jdg.10.3
§ Jair = "he enlightens"
1) a descendant of Manasseh who conquered many towns during the time of the conquest
2) the Gileadite, a judge of Israel for 22 years during the time of the judges; father of 30 sons
3) a Benjamite, son of Kish, and father of Mordecai
4) father of Elhanan, one of David's mighty warriors

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Est.2.5;
son of: Shimei (H8096U);
father of: Mordecai (H4782H)
